Subject: Damage Equipment's Insurance Claim Due to Water leakage
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Hagop,

 

Hope you’re well.

 

We need your support to submit insurance claim for damages due to water leakage at security control room at level shoes Dubai mall.

 

Attached incident report by Dubai mall and quotations for damaged equipment’s.

 

PC & Monitors – 14301 AED

Lights replacement – 787.50 AED

Flooring repair – 4252.5 AED

Other IT equipment – 551.25 AED

 

Total – 19892.25 AED

 

Regards,

 

 

 

TARUN GULATI

BCC: 
Date: 2025-08-25 12:29
Subject: Damage Equipment's Insurance Claim Due to Water leakage
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Hani,

Hope all is well.

With reference to the PAR insurance policy of Allied Enterprises LLC, please that the there was a water leakage incident at security control room at Level Shoes Dubai mall.

 

Attached incident report by Dubai mall and quotations for damaged equipment’s.

 

2 PCs & Monitors      14,301 AED

Lights replacement         787 AED

Flooring repair          4,252 AED

Other IT equipment         551 AED

 

Total – 19,892 AED




Please request GIG  to open a claim file and arrange a survey to visit the site if needed.

 

Thank You & Kind Regards,

Hagop

ID: C1GYZK0_05
From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
To: Tarun Gulati <Tarun.Gulati@levelshoes.com>
CC: Sujith Stephen <Sujith.Stephen@chalhoub.com>; Kristina Tokieva <Kristina.Tokieva@levelshoes.com>; Glory Vic Fortuno <Glory.Fortuno@levelshoes.com>; Mehdi Kohen <Mehdi.Kohen@chalhoub.com>; Clemence Mauge <Clemence.Mauge@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-09-19 17:19
Subject: RE: Damage Equipment's Insurance Claim Due to Water leakage
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Tarun,

 

Please proceed.

 

Kindly request the contractor to take comprehensive photos of all damages and to provide a technical report and update the same together with the completion report. This will be provided to the insurer for validation.

 

Once the payment is done for the works, please share the transfer advice copy and the final invoice.

 

There will be a USD 2,000 deductible which will apply as per the policy terms, expected settlement to be taken as accrual would be the balance.

 

Best regards,

Hagop
